title: The Camelot Kids, Part Three
description: In The Camelot Kids, Part Two Simon Sharp was accused of murder by the heir to King Arthur's throne. But that's the least of his worries. The Camelot Kids, Part Three is where things get complicated. When a stranger sells Simon some seeds at the spring fair, he inadvertently sets off a plot that may mean the end of New Camelot. Of course, nothing is as it seems in Merlin's castle and Simon soon learns just how much danger he and his new friends are in. In The Camelot Kids, Part Three, Simon must always look over his shoulder for the enemy. But should he be looking to his side instead?Cover art by Nathan Fox.
author: Ben Zackheim
